description.text:
[url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ][img]https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-7289da?logo=discord&logoColor=fff&style=flat-square[/img][/url][url=https://ko-fi.com/jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Support-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=kofi&color=222222[/img][/url] [url=https://www.twitch.tv/Jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Catch%20me%20Live-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=Twitch&color=22283D[/img][/url]
An Interrupt Tracker does what an Interrupt Tracker does. Also shows if people are dead/out of Range.


[b][color=#ff0000][size=36]FAQ & Known Issues: read below before posting a question [/size][/color][/b]

Q: Can you add spell X?
A: This aura was made to track interupts. If any interupt or silence is missing please do ping me about it. This Aura was NOT made to track stuns and other types of cc like blind/disorient that can be used to interrupt some mobs. If cc's would get added you would have a list of like 30 spells per key and thats not very helpful there are other auras to keep track of aoe control. See it like this: If you can interrupt a casting boss it will be considered. If you can't interrupt a boss with the spell it's not being added.

Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my [url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ]Discord[/url].

Based on the works of [url=https://wago.io/InterruptTracker]Nnoggie[/url]

If you like my work and want to support me you can [url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG]donate[/url]
description.html: An Interrupt Tracker does what an Interrupt Tracker does. Also shows if people are dead/out of Range. FAQ & Known Issues: read below before posting a question Q: Can you add spell X? A: This aura was made to track interupts. If any interupt or silence is missing please do ping me about it. This Aura was NOT made to track stuns and other types of cc like blind/disorient that can be used to interrupt some mobs. If cc's would get added you would have a list of like 30 spells per key and thats not very helpful there are other auras to keep track of aoe control. See it like this: If you can interrupt a casting boss it will be considered. If you can't interrupt a boss with the spell it's not being added. Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. Based on the works of Nnoggie If you like my work and want to support me you can donate

changelog.text: more fixes for auras randomly hiding
fix potential issue on displaying own player after joining a group/ initial login
fixed interrrupt for blood and unholy
more nilchecking if someone is for some reason not running any of the major addings shipping the spec lib
make respeccing of teammates more reliable by erasing race condition
more fixes for group roster changes

- even more agressive nilchecking
- fixed an error where the wrong names were being shown when the unitid changed e.g. from switching leader
fix lua errors reported by 三皈依#3388 and Hollicsh
fix nil errors and only load in dungeons again
add more agressive nilchecking
fix interupt icon and mark showing up incorrectly
fix couple of errors on initial load

initial tww release. Thgis version still has some issues on login but i can't currently get the Fixed and finished version from beta since servers are down. Will update this later today to reflect those changes when i can
- fixed aug evoker cd not calculating correctly depending on the talents used
-fixed vengeance dh sigil of silence cd from displaying incorrectly
add back white text color when spell is on cd
added miss kick display back
added augmentation
added nilcheck
fix error if you don't have ViragDevtools
add missing unitfilters
- reworked sorting to work properly and add a fix for duplicate nameplate aura creation
fixed silencing sigil for demonhunter when playing precise sigils [TODO] fix for concentraded sigils
- added support for GrimroireOfSacrifice for destro and affliction warlock
- fixed cd of Avengers Shield
added hunters Wailing Arrow (changed tabs are Actions and author options)
added Warrior disrupting shout
hopefully fixed bug with friendly nameplates
added back accidentally removed option
added option to use static ordering of classes (changed author options and group tab)
added preservation Evoker (thanks Shackman2006) change in Actions: on init only
- added Evoker (Changes apply to Actions and Conditions aswell as Author Options)
- fixed potential nil errors (this change only affects code in Triggers)
- added MultiCDTalent support and Interrupt Success support (changes only in code -> onInit and Trigger)
fixed some bugs (thanks @fi2006ao)
fixed potential table value error
- fixed spell reflect from showing up if not talented
-fixed potential error on name acuisation
actually fixed lgist error
- fixed LGIST errors
- fixed items not showing up on manual inspecting
- fixed potential errors

- removed relying on Lib group Inspect
- reworked to support Dragonflight talents

Known Issues:
 Successful interrupt modifiers (meaning when you succesfully interupt cooldown is being reduced) are currently missing 
 if Multiple talents modify cooldown that doesn't work currently
changed spell reflect to 20 sec cd
- removed some unnecessary code leftovers
- minor code refactoring
- added nilcheck to prevent error from happening when state.name is nil
- fixed own cd's to work properly with CDR effects
-fixed destro warlock
- changed hiding of spell that was interupted so sorting should now work properly
-fixed nil errors

-fixed own CD's
-fixed display for spells that update their CD
-fixed CD display of others sending CD-Updates
- fixed Survival hunter kick
- fixed potential nil error
-removed leftover prints
- fixed warlock interrupts (demo)
- fixed potential nil error
- attempt to fix some false hiding of bars

- Refactord code to work for talented cdr
- fixed Warlock pet interupts to display what was interupted

TODO:
- make sorting options actually do stuff

v.20
- fixed "showed miss kicks" options to misbehave when "using class color for interupts" isn't set
v.21
- readded accidentally removed loading condition
- fixed "showed miss kicks" options to misbehave when "using class color for interupts" isn't set

- added back missing load condition for in group

TODO:
- fix priest/other talented cdr
- make sorting options actually do stuff

- Removed relience on ZT as that is no longer being maintained

TODO:
- fix priest/other talented cdr
- make sorting options actually do stuff
- renamed aura
- fixed dk text not coloring properly
- revert text color changes
- small fixes

- updated to use Weakaura formating options for textcolor instead of conditions
- changed state.unit to be exposed via member.unitName instead of member.unit to prevent it from bugging out on joining/leaving party members after originally being loaded
- added unit into states so you can group by nameplate
- forgot to add the loading conditions back in soz for having to update again
- added ability to not Class color Bar/Text
- changed font to work with russian (kyrillic) languages
- fixed background issue with not changing to black if certain conditions were true
- fixed background issue with not changing to black if certain conditions were true
- minor fix

- Reworked to use Nnogies Frontend as a Template this adds
 -> Check if party member is dead/out of range
 -> can show Interupted Targer(mark)/Spell(icon)
 -> can display missed kicks
Updated for new Backend version and spell Cache also figured out that paladin Color was broken so thats fixed aswell now
Forgot the condition for the ready text so sorry for another update

Switched the style to conditions which also fixed some bugs couldn't test this properly yes so might not be working 100%. Also removed some obsolete custom options. If this isn't broken this will be the last update unless zen updates his backend again
Forgot to add the loading conidition back and Spell Reflect also wasn't selected so you have to import HAH! got you
The style wasn't rly finished yet so I had to do some coding magic to polish it up, also fixed some bugs in the meantime. Where is Hagrid telling me that I'm a wizard?
